TemplateConfiguration._Description: An empty Android broadcast receiver. A broadcast receiver receives and reacts to announcements sent by Android processes.

TemplateFiles.File:
namespace ${Namespace}
open System open System.Collections.Generic open System.Linq open System.Text
open Android.App open Android.Content open Android.OS open Android.Runtime open Android.Views open Android.Widget
[<BroadcastReceiver>] type ${Name} = inherit BroadcastReceiver ()
override x.OnReceive (context, intent) = Toast.MakeText(context, "Received intent!", ToastLength.Short).Show ()
